text: Thank you for the note. I have a client that wants a new template but have their heart set on the new functionality. So I guess I will have to tell them it might be a while for that.

hello, i just wanna ask if once this campaign fields are filled up, will the 'View in Browser' url automatically be hidden in the browser and will only show up on any email clients? Because right now while we're testing out, the 'View in Browser' is still showing up on any browser.
